content: >http://www.guardian.co.uk/business/2009/mar/14/bernard-madoff-lavish-lifestyle-bail Jailed after pleading guilty and in the slammer for three days while awaiting sentence, Bernard madoff has asked the court to grant bail. Why? he wants to help remunerate those he swindled. First off he reveals Mrs. Madoff's nest eggs. But they're all in her name and she probably inherited it all. Then there's moolah being tracked to foreign banks. >http://www.guardian.co.uk/business/2009/mar/15/bernard-madoff-deposits-britain-fraud Maybe Bernard should remain a guest at public expense until he remembers where he put it all, or can prove he's the Mother Teresa of Wall St. The slammer seems to be *****ing his conscience.
